channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watch: Intelligence leaders testify before Congress, fresh off the group chat fiasco

item.title: Pete Marocco tried to upend USAID in 2020 -- and failed. In 2025, he dismantled it

item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs embraced telehealth, especially for mental health care, in recent years. Now, staffers hired to give therapy and ot...

item.title: What happens when a Chicago hospital bows to federal pressure on trans care for teens

item.title: China releases staff of an American due diligence firm in move to woo investors
item.description: The release of the employees from the firm, the Mintz Group, comes as China is trying to woo back foreign investors to help revive its sagging economy...

item.title: Palestinian Oscar winner attacked by Israeli settlers then detained, activists say
item.description: Hamdan Ballal was beaten by settlers before being taken away, his No Other Land co-director said.

item.title: Brazil's Supreme Court to decide whether to put Bolsonaro on trial
item.description: Jair Bolsonaro is accused of plotting a coup, but the ex-president says he is the victim of a witch hunt.

item.title: Man and 2 kids found alive after Alaska plane crash
item.description: A man and two school-age children were found with non-life-threatening injuries near the wreckage of a small plane on Alaska's Kenai Peninsula.

item.title: Fired federal workers face choices now that a judge wants them rehired

item.description: Leaders of U.S. intelligence agencies are appearing before the Senate Intelligence Committee.

item.title: Five takeaways from leaked US top military chat group

item.title: Who is Frank Bisignano, Trump's nominee to oversee Social Security?
item.description: President Trump's nominee to head the SSA is likely to face tough questioning from Democrats in a Senate hearing on Tuesday.

item.title: Grandparents arrested on suspicion of toddler's murder in French Alps
item.description: Emile Soleil mysteriously vanished in 2023, in a case that made headlines across France.

item.description: President Trump's nominee to run the Social Security Administration will face questions about his ability to run the massive retirement program.

item.title: Sudan army accused of killing hundreds in airstrike on Darfur market
item.description: Videos posted on social media show the smoking ruins of market stalls and charred bodies.
